text: Gennady Andreyevich Sapunov (; born 5 December 1938) was a Greco-Roman wrestler from Russia. He competed in the 1968 Olympics and won two gold and a silver medal at the World Wrestling Championships. From 1979 to 1990 he was the trainer for the Soviet Greco-Roman wrestling team. ==References== ==External links== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic wrestlers of the Soviet Union Category:Wrestlers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Soviet male sport wrestlers Category:World Wrestling Championships medalists
title: Gennady Sapunov
